definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence

all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world

sentences.english: And for Johnny rook, the wait is over.
sentences.chinese: 對約翰鴉來說，等待已經結束。

sentences.english: Confusion of/ between the crow and the rook is quite common.
sentences.chinese: 烏鴉和白嘴鴉的混淆是相當平常的。

sentences.english: The Raven Queen provides a method for the adventurers to travel into Death's Reach.
sentences.chinese: 鴉後保留著某個能夠讓冒險者們潛進死亡岬的方法。

definition: oriole or various birds of the Sylvidae family including warblers
